title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.9 - Prohibition of landing or taking-off under certain circumstances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.9 - Prohibition of landing or taking-off under certain circumstances

State Regulations

The airport operator may prohibit aircraft from landing, except for emergency landings, or taking-off at any time when, and under any
circumstances under which, the airport operator deems such landings and
take-offs may be likely to endanger persons or property, or exceed the weight
limitation established for the airport. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
